doc:
Anthony Head https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Anthony_Head 0 Anthony Stewart Head (born 20 February 1954), usually known as Anthony Head, or simply Tony Head, is an English actor and musician. He rose to fame in the UK following his role in the Gold Blend couple television advertisements for Nescafé Gold Blend, and is known for his roles as Rupert Giles in Buffy the Vampire Slayer, Uther Pendragon in Merlin, the Prime Minister in Little Britain, and as Herc Shipwright in BBC Radio 4's Cabin Pressure. Anthony_Stewart_Head ( born 20_February_1954 ) , usually_known as Anthony_Head , or simply Tony_Head , is an_English_actor_and_musician . He rose to fame in the_UK following his_role in the_Gold_Blend_couple_television_advertisements for Nescafé_Gold_Blend , and is_known for his_roles as Rupert_Giles in Buffy the_Vampire_Slayer , Uther_Pendragon in Merlin , the_Prime_Minister in Little_Britain , and as Herc_Shipwright in BBC_Radio_4 's_Cabin_Pressure .
